name: Benefit for George Banuelos Jr. - Individual Ticket
description:
On Feb of 2010 George Banuelos Jr. was diagnosed with a severe/moderate case of Crohn’s Disease and Eosinophic Esophagitis, Food Allergies, Allergic Rhinitis. Soon after, George was also diagnosed with a mild case of Churg Strauss, and Eosinophilia. George developed blood clots, kidney stones, pneumonia, Stongyloides (a parasite), and antiphosolipid syndrome antibodies. He continues to see many different specialists because it is still not clear if there is another disease that George is suffering from and his illness is still not under control. George went from a Coxswain for Loyola’s Crew Team, and enjoying being a teenager to a young man having to accept a very adult role. 
Our family continues to struggle emotionally and financially because of the illness of our son. 
Please join us on Saturday, November 5th 2011 we will have a fundraiser at Monastero’s Restorante 3935 W Devon Ave. Tickets will be $50.00 per person which includes a dinner buffet and entertainment, cash bar will be availible. The proceeds from this event will go towards George’s medical expenses. We will have silent auctions, and raffles. As George would say "It's A Party!"

**Online sales have ended. Tickets will still be available at the door on Saturday Nov. 5th starting at 6:30pm.**

name: Team Crohnies Wristbands
description: Support Team Crohnies by purchasing one of our new Awareness Matters Wristbands. The wristbands are purple with black lettering that says, "Crohn's Awareness Matters." Each wristband is $3.00 and all the profits will be donated to our fundraising goal. Thank you for your support!

name: Team Crohnies Keep Faith T-Shirt
description: Support Team Crohnies by purchasing our Keep Faith - Find A Cure Tie-Dye shirt! All profits from the shirts will go directly to our Take Steps Walk fundraising goal! The back of each shirt says Team Crohnies as well as our website. The shirts are also made with fiber reactive dyes which are permanent, brighter, and longer lasting than all purpose dyes. Each shirt is only $10.00 and all the profits will be donated to our fundraising goal. We thank you once again for your support. We would also like to thank our presenting sponsor, Shockwaves Promotional Apparel for graciously printing all of our Team Crohnies shirts! Created by Jess Serrano and Allison Achtel.

name: Team Crohnies Awareness Matters T-Shirt
description: Support Team Crohnies by purchasing our Awareness Matters Tie-Dye shirt! All profits from the shirts will go directly to our Take Steps Walk fundraising goal! The shirts will have a crohn's ribbon design on the front, and George's famous saying, It's a Party, on the back. The shirts will also be tie-dyed with fiber reactive dyes. Fiber reactive dyes are permanent over all purpose dyes as they are much brighter, last longer, and don't loose their color even with multiple washings. Each shirt is only $10.00 and all the profits will be donated to our fundraising goal. We thank you once again for your support! We would also like to thank our presenting sponsor, Shockwaves Promotional Apparel for graciously printing all of our Team Banuelos shirts! Limited supplies available, so get your shirt today! Created by Jess Serrano, Allison Achtel, John Witry, and with help by many of our wonderful friends.
